name: vscode-code-counter
description: Visual line counting with customizable emoji indicators and comprehensive project reports

commands.title: CodeCounter: Reset Emoji Indicators to Defaults

codeCounter.excludePatterns.description: Glob patterns for files to exclude from counting

codeCounter.outputDirectory.description: Directory where reports will be generated

codeCounter.autoGenerate.description: Automatically generate reports when files are saved

codeCounter.showNotificationOnAutoGenera.description: Show notification with report summary when auto-generating reports

codeCounter.showLineCountsInExplorer.description: Show line counts in file explorer - always visible or on hover

codeCounter.showLineCountsInTabs.description: Show line counts in status bar - always visible or on hover

codeCounter.cacheLineCounts.description: Cache line counts for better performance

codeCounter.lineThresholds.midThreshold.description: Line count threshold for warning indicator (medium file size)

codeCounter.lineThresholds.highThreshold.description: Line count threshold for danger indicator (large file size)

codeCounter.emojis.normal.description: Emoji for line counts below warning threshold (low line count). You can use any emoji!

codeCounter.emojis.warning.description: Emoji for line counts above warning threshold (medium line count). You can use any emoji!

codeCounter.emojis.danger.description: Emoji for line counts above danger threshold (high line count). You can use any emoji!

codeCounter.emojis.folders.normal.description: Emoji for folders with low average line count (appears on left side of folder name)

codeCounter.emojis.folders.warning.description: Emoji for folders with medium average line count (appears on left side of folder name)

codeCounter.emojis.folders.danger.description: Emoji for folders with high average line count (appears on left side of folder name)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.test:coverage: npm run compile && c8 --reporter=html --reporter=text --exclude='out/test/**' --exclude='**/*.test.js' --exclude='out/test/mocks/**' --exclude='out/test/setup.js' mocha out/test/suite/*.test.js --ui tdd --timeout 10000 --require out/test/setup.js
scripts.test:coverage-basic: npm run compile && c8 --reporter=html --reporter=text --exclude='out/test/**' --exclude='**/*.test.js' mocha out/test/suite/*.test.js --ui tdd --timeout 10000
scripts.test:coverage-utils: npm run compile && c8 --reporter=html --reporter=text --exclude='out/test/**' --exclude='**/*.test.js' mocha out/test/suite/fileUtils.test.js out/test/suite/xmlGenerator.test.js --ui tdd --timeout 10000 --require out/test/setup.js
